entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/jasper-reporting-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=135 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=500m -p CPU_LIMIT=1500m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=1000Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=2000Mi | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration jasper-reporting-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc jasper-reporting-service
